post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
It was for the 48 hour film project in Buffalo, NY.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3nYex0dToSM

that was fun!

post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body: ha, cool, I can tell you probably got bored of trying to make it a horror film towards the end. Turned out good though.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: we didn't have anything planned after the "getting the gun" scene. So we wung it from there.

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body: I think this would make a good Doom 3 mod. The chainsaw through the body was outstanding!

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: if you want to make a mod of it that would be AWESOME.

post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body: movie based mods never work

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body: BLT was a huge underground success!

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
Jack Rammsdell wrote:
movie based mods never work


it's always recommend to contact the copyright holder. I'll have to check & see if I can get ahold of him. Besides BLT, Aliens Doom was a huge hit too.

post.author: Kristus
post.body: Indeed, it made a splash rivaling that of Doom 2.
